scripts.start: echo "Use npm run agg or npm run vis"
scripts.build: npm install && cd visualizer/vestige && npm run build
scripts.agg: cd aggregator/agg-lb && start nginx && cd .. && concurrently "set PORT=3001 && node index-agg.js" "set PORT=3002 && node index-agg.js" "set PORT=3003 && node index-agg.js"
scripts.vis: cd visualizer/vis-lb && start nginx && cd .. && concurrently "set PORT=8001 && node index-vis.js" "set PORT=8002 && node index-vis.js"
scripts.emm: concurrently "cd emitters/emitter1 && node -r ./tracing.js index-e1.js" "cd emitters/emitter2 && node -r ./tracing.js index-e2.js"
